description: Greencycle is an innovative startup, focused on revolutionizing the agricultural sector in Peru. By providing digital identifications, or "food passports," for agricultural products, Greencycle ensures the safety, quality, and sustainability of food throughout the production chain. Collaborating with 25,000 farmers, the initiative aims to improve farmers' incomes, combat deforestation, and enhance food safety, ultimately contributing to a healthier food system and better quality of life for communities.
name: Greencycle
